title: orb akustik font ID
content:
hoping to ID all fonts used (logo + text). possibly same. thank you !

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/orbakustik/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233510/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/orbakustik/)
author: lucadelcarlo

comments.content: fonts are in the first image

this thread should be over in the Type ID board:

[http://www.typophile.com/forum/29](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233510/http:/www.typophile.com/forum/29 "http://www.typophile.com/forum/29")

that said, i think the akustik is [helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233510/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/helvetica/fonts/) and loudspeakers [skia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233510/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/skia/fonts/)

i'm not sure what orb is set in
